news.title: 3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect

news.content:
Quick update!

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.
Note: No action is required, although if you have ThreeFold Connect installed already, you may have to update the app before the name changes on your device.
news.excerpt: As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

previous.title: Grid 2.4 is coming to mainnet soon!
previous.excerpt: We are in the final stages of testing Grid 2.4 & will soon release on mainnet!

next.title: Digital Twin v1 is Weeks Away!
next.excerpt: The first version of Digital Twin will feature messaging and video calling.
